Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2013 12:07PM Jan-Barlow wrote: Hi, New to all this- but just like to say- I had 9 biopsy's on rt breast end of Jan and leant then that it was likley to be cancer-( which it is) and in lymth etc. Around 2 days later had huge 5" round area of haematoma which has now reduced to 1.5" round approx. I went all the colours of the rainbow but it was uncomfortable but didn't hurt. I have my op on 11th and go in for pre op assessment tomorrow- in Churchill Hosp Oxford UK. The bruising will go down- be it slowly. Would love to keep in touch with anyone feeling low- as I am very positive about the process and have already bought a wig!
Posts.Title: Big hematoma - anyone else get one? OldOakTree Moderators
